group_1.textCenter: Well, it's kinda like a hangout@for Magical Girls, y'know?

group_1.narration: Rika Ayano.@While we made our way to wherever she@was taking me, she introduced herself.

group_1.textLeft: And a left at the next corner, okay?

group_1.narration: She seemed a little pushy at first, but then@I caught her looking back at me every once@in a while to check and see how I was.@She comforted me, even though I'd been@trying to kill myself just before.

group_1.textLeft: Okay! Here we are![chara:303101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303101:cheek_0][chara:303101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:303101:lipSynch_1]
Hey there!@Is Emirin free?

group_1.textRight: Hey, Rika!@[chara:300801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:300801:cheek_0][chara:300801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300801:lipSynch_1]Yeah, she just started her break!

group_1.textLeft: Umm... Errr...
My Magical Girl friend, Ren Isuzu!
Umm...h-hello...

group_1.narration: She told me later that this@girl's name was Akira Shinobu.
I couldn't even introduce myself properly,@but even still, Rika was so sweet to me@that I felt like I was going to cry.

group_1.textLeft: Hey! Rikki!@Thanks!
Huh, who's this? A friend?

Ren?[chara:300601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?@[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:motion_200][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]Oh my god! That's like, such a great name!
I'm Emiri Kisaki! Nice to meetcha![chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.7][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]
So Ren! This is a counseling room!
And people come to Emily here for advice@about their problems.

group_1.textRight: (Oh, I get it… Emiri is Emily…)

group_1.textLeft: If something's bothering you or something,@this is the place for you!
People are all like…
"I felt so much better after I talked to @Emily!"

group_1.textRight: (So that's why she brought me here...)

group_1.textLeft: So what's the deal?@Somethin' buggin' ya, Renki?
Huh? Oh, nothing!@Doesn't mean a thing!
Nicknames aren't about meaning!@It's all about the ambivalence!
Yeah, whatever! Anyway, why don't@you just sit down and we can chat?

Oh my god, yeah! I totally get it!@[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:motion_200][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]I know exactly what you mean!

group_1.textRight: Uh, Ren hasn't said anything yet...

group_1.textLeft: Really?!@Oh, I guess you're right!

group_1.narration: Why?@Why is it so hard for me to talk?

group_1.textLeft: A beautiful aroma is perfect for curing a@troubled heart! Here!
I'll give you my favorite hand cream!
Oh, but it was used by none other than me,@Ria Ami! So it's actually worth more now!

group_1.textRight: Ren, [chara:300801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300801:cheek_0][chara:300801:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300801:lipSynch_1]if you don't want it, feel free to just@leave it somewhere.

group_1.textLeft: Hey!

group_1.textRight: Here you are.@Some nice chamomile tea.
It's supposed to be really good for soothing@the spirit.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you...

group_1.narration: Nobody blamed me for not saying a word.@What's more, they all went out of their@way to try to make me feel comfortable@so it would be easy for me to talk.

group_1.textRight: Oh![chara:303101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] I just thought of a great idea!
You're gonna close up soon, right?
Emirin, will you hang out with us for a bit?
Let's go to the chemistry club!

group_1.textLeft: The chemistry club?@Why not?
